languages.text: Вы дали второй шанс капитану блюстителей Хротко, пытавшемуся запутать следствие, и постригли его в послушники для покаяния.
You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.
languages.original_text: Вы дали второй шанс капитану блюстителей Хротко, пытавшемуся запутать следствие, и постригли его в послушники для покаяния.

traits.locale_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

languages.text: Diste una segunda oportunidad a Hrotko, el capitán de los guardias de la nave que intentó frustrar la investigación, ordenándole que hiciese penitencia como iniciado del templo.
languages.original_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

traits.locale_text: Diste una segunda oportunidad a Hrotko, el capitán de los guardias de la nave que intentó frustrar la investigación, ordenándole que hiciese penitencia como iniciado del templo.

languages.text: あなたは、調査を欺こうとした船のエンフォーサーの中隊長であるフロトコに、神殿で入門者として懺悔をさせることで、2度目のチャンスを与えた。
languages.original_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

traits.locale_text: あなたは、調査を欺こうとした船のエンフォーサーの中隊長であるフロトコに、神殿で入門者として懺悔をさせることで、2度目のチャンスを与えた。

languages.text: 执法者赫洛卡上尉试图干扰调查，但你给了他第二次机会，让他在神殿中担任助祭，以此进行悔过。
languages.original_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

traits.locale_text: 执法者赫洛卡上尉试图干扰调查，但你给了他第二次机会，让他在神殿中担任助祭，以此进行悔过。

languages.text: Du hast Hrotko, dem Captain der Enforcer des Schiffs, der die Untersuchung in die falsche Richtung lenken wollte, eine zweite Chance gegeben, indem du ihm erlaubt hast, am Schrein als Novize Buße zu tun.
languages.original_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

traits.locale_text: Du hast Hrotko, dem Captain der Enforcer des Schiffs, der die Untersuchung in die falsche Richtung lenken wollte, eine zweite Chance gegeben, indem du ihm erlaubt hast, am Schrein als Novize Buße zu tun.

languages.text: Vous avez accordé une seconde chance à Hrotko, le capitaine des prévôts qui avait tenté de truquer l'enquête, en le condamnant pour sa peine à devenir initié au sanctuaire.
languages.original_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez accordé une seconde chance à Hrotko, le capitaine des prévôts qui avait tenté de truquer l'enquête, en le condamnant pour sa peine à devenir initié au sanctuaire.

languages.text: Soruşturmayı yanlış yöne çekmeye çalışan gemideki infazcıların komutanı Hrotko'ya, mabette zangoçluk yaparak kefaretini ödeyeceği ikinci bir şans verdin.
languages.original_text: You gave Hrotko, captain of the ship's enforcers who attempted to mislead the investigation, a second chance by having him serve penance as an initiate at the shrine.
